text.text: WOULD YOU LIKE TOGO ALONE OR IN AGROUP?
你是想单独去还是团体去?
Mr.Lee:Thank you forshowing me around here thelast three days.
李先生:谢谢你带我游玩了三天。
Ms Wang:My pleasure.I hope you've enjoyed yourvisit.
王小姐:别客气，但愿你玩得很尽兴。
Mr.Lee:Oh,yes. I'mplanning to go to Suzhou nextweek.
李先生:噢，很尽兴。下周我打算去苏州。
Ms Wang:Oh,that'sgreat!Would you like to goalone or in a group?
王小姐:噢，那太好了!你是想单独去还是团体去?
